title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 613.12 - Members of first department indigent defense organization oversight committee as volunteers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 613.12 - Members of first department indigent defense organization oversight committee as volunteers

State Regulations

The members of the first department
indigent defense organization oversight committee, as volunteers, are expressly
authorized to participate in a State-sponsored volunteer program within the
meaning of section
17
(1)
of the Public Officers

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
613.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
